mapper.select: select e.*, c.book_category, f.first_category from ebook e, second_category c, first_category f where e.category_num=c.category_num and f.first_num=c.first_num and e.book_num=#{bookNum}

SELECT * FROM book_hashtag WHERE book_num=#{bookNum} ORDER BY hash_num DESC
